question: Margin of clearence for anal carcinoma is-
exp: Ans. is 'a' i. e., 2 cm o Wide local excision leaving a margin of at least 2. 5 cm of tissue all round with block dissection of the inguinal nodes; If they' are involved.

question: Commonest type of Anal canal Ca is:
exp: Ans. is 'a' ie Squamous cell Ca Mainly 3 types of malignant neoplasm are seen in anal canal. Squamous cell Ca (MC). Basal cell Ca (IInd me). Melanoma. Remember. MC type of rectal & colon Ca - Adenocarcinoma*.
